author: 5163 (@Eunnjooo)
content: I HAVE EXACTLY THE SAME PROBLEM. THEY MESSAGE ME AFTER 6 4 MONTHS SAYING THAT I HAVE TO PAY 1050 WHEN I JUST USED IT FOR TWO MONTHS THEN I STOP USING IT BECAUSE OF THE PROBLEM AMKING ONLINE PAYMENT SINCE I AM A STUDENT. I THOUGHT THEY WOULD JUST HALT MY ACCOUNT UNTIL I MAKE THE PAYMENT BUT THEN HERE COMES THE MESSAGE ASKING ME TO PAY FOR SOMETHING THAT I NEVER KNEW. THE SALESMAN NEVER TOLD ME ANYTHING ABOUT THIS, I SIGN UP FOR THE YES HUDDLE ONLY THRU WHATSAPP BECAUSE THEY CAME TO MY COLLEGE FOR YES PROMOTION. AND I WE MADE THE REGISTRATION PROCESS THRU WS ONLY. I HAVE NEVER SIGN THE FORM!!!!! BUT I GIVE MY IC PICTURE LA.  I HAVE NEVER BEING TOLD ABOUT THE RULES LAW AND THAT SUPPRESS REGULATION MADE BY THOSE STUPID YTL. I WOULD NOT MAKE ANY PAYMENT UNLESS IF SUDDENLY I GOT RM 1000
